import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const App = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({}); const [location, setLocation] = useState(''); const url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${location}&appid=f54f0e11e97de91f07e6530f51ff30e7` const searchLocation = (event) => { if (event.key === 'Enter') { axios.get(url).then((response) => { setData(response.data) console.log(response.data) }) } } return (
